sentences.sContent: Many people are in arrears with their rent.

synos.tran: [会计]拖欠；待完成的事；应付欠款

remMethod.val: ar(表加强) + rear(后面的) + s → 拖在后面的事情 → 欠款； 待完成的事

trans.tranCn: [会计] 拖欠；待完成的事；应付欠款
trans.tranOther: if someone is in arrears, or if their payments are in arrears, they are late in paying something that they should pay regularly, such as rent
